title: Work and Activities
goal: Ask and answer about jobs and hobbies.

sections.content:
Warm-up (2-3 min)

Family review:

mamta = ?     patfu = ?     panzi = ?

(Answers: mother, father, child)

New Material (5-7 min)

New Vocabulary

Lojban Place Structure English
jatna x1 is leader/captain of x2 in activity x3 leader/captain
kansa x1 accompanies x2 in doing x3 accompany/be with

Asking About Work

do zukte ma

What do you do?

mi gunka bu'u lo kagni

I work at a company.

mi jatna lo gunka se kamni

I'm a leader of the work team.

Asking About Hobbies

do nelci ma

What do you like?

mi nelci lo nu tcidu lo cukta

I like reading books.

mi nelci lo nu sanga gi'e dansu

I like singing and dancing.

With kansa

mi kansa do lo nu citka

I accompany you in eating. (I eat with you.)

xu do kansa mi lo nu klama

Will you accompany me going? (Will you go with me?)

Activity Dialogue

A: do zukte ma
B: mi ctuca lo jbobau
A: .ui xamgu .i do nelci lo nu ctuca xu
B: .ie .i lo nu ctuca cu pluka

(A: What do you do? B: I teach Lojban. A: Great! Do you like teaching? B: Yes, teaching is pleasant.)

Key Point

Use abstractions to talk about activities: lo nu [activity].
sections.title: New Material (5-7 min)

sections.content:
Practice (4-5 min)

Exercise 1: Work

Translate:

  1. I work at a company.
  2. What do you do?
  3. I'm a teacher.
Answers
  1. mi gunka bu'u lo kagni
  2. do zukte ma
  3. mi ctuca

Exercise 2: Hobbies

Translate:

  1. I like reading.
  2. I like music.
  3. What do you like?
Answers
  1. mi nelci lo nu tcidu
  2. mi nelci lo zgike
  3. do nelci ma

Exercise 3: With kansa

Translate:

  1. I eat with Alice.
  2. Will you go with me?
  3. I study with my friend.
Answers
  1. mi kansa la .alis. lo nu citka
  2. xu do kansa mi lo nu klama
  3. mi kansa lo pendo be mi lo nu tadni

items.answer: `xu do kansa mi lo nu klama`
`mi kansa lo pendo be mi lo nu tadni`

sections.content:
Conversation Challenge (1-2 min)

Create a dialogue about work/hobbies:

Example:

A: do zukte ma
B: mi ciska lo cukta
A: .ui do nelci tu'a lo cukta xu
B: .ie mi so'iroi tcidu
A: mi ji'a nelci lo nu tcidu

Summary

You practiced asking and answering about work and hobbies using activities and abstractions.
